technology.short_description: "Give da gobbos sum extra grub ta keep 'em in check."

effects.description: Leadership: +2 for Goblin units
Upkeep: -3% for Goblin Infantry units
Melee attack: +2 for Goblin units
Missile strength: +5% for Goblin and Night Goblin Missile Infantry units

technology.short_description: Goblin riders bounce wildly on the battlefield, bashing man and beast aside as they charge in and out.

effects.description: Scrap Upgrades Unlocked for: Goblins, Goblin Archers, Pump Wagons and Nasty Skulkers
Weapon strength: +6% for Pump Wagon units
Melee attack: +4 for Goblin and Night Goblin Infantry units

technology.short_description: "Gotta hand it to those Forest Goblins, easy to get dead wranglin' massive spiders. Better dem than us!"

effects.description: Scrap Upgrades Unlocked for: Goblin Spider Riders and Goblin Spider Rider Archers
Recruitment cost: -6% for Spider Rider units
Leadership: +4 for Spider Riders units

technology.short_description: "You betta get fasta or dere will be a smashin'!"
Despite its size, an Arachnarok is still a Spider by nature, using the terrain to its advantage when stalking and trapping its prey.

technology.short_description: "Throw da gobbos sum iron scraps ta take a betta beating!"

Speed: +10% for Infantry units

technology.short_description: "Strap anyfin' you can find onta da wolves to keep 'em whole."

effects.description: Melee attack: +3 for Goblin units
Speed: +5% for Goblin and Night Goblin units
Charge bonus: +10% for Night Goblin units

technology.short_description: Better beast breeders lead to more devastating creatures to unleash onto the battlefield.

technology.short_description: "We stole da designs from da stinkin' Elves!"

Ammunition: +15% for Missile Infantry units

technology.short_description: "Shamans are nasty buggers as it iz, but Raknik iz one depraved gobbo!"

effects.description: Adds the Goblin Great Shaman Raknik Spiderclaw to your faction's Lord pool

technology.short_description: Although it is such a large target, the hide of these great beasts is thick and hard.

effects.description: Income from sacking settlements: +20%

technology.short_description: "Bigga camps means a bigga tribe, and more ladz for fightin’!"

effects.description: Growth: +10

technology.short_description: "Shuddup, da lot of ya! Or da Boss'll have ya!"

effects.description: Control: +3

technology.short_description: "Dey taste like death, but do da opposite!"

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +8%

technology.short_description: The Night Goblins strike from their natural vantage point: in the very beating heart of darkness itself.

effects.description: Upkeep: -5%

technology.short_description: "If da gits can't run fasta, make 'em hide betta!"

effects.description: Hero action cost: -15%
Hero action success chance: +5%

technology.short_description: "Dis Waaagh! just keeps on goin'! Get 'em, ladz!"

effects.description: Enemy Hero action success chance: -10%
Enemy Hero action success chance: -10%

Corruption: -4
	(factionwide)

technology.short_description: "'Ere come da boyz! Dey want Waaagh!"

effects.description: Reputation: +1 per turn

technology.short_description: "Oi! Da Big Boss needz ya ta deal wiv dat uva fing!"

effects.description: Leadership: +3 for Goblin units
Casualty replenishment rate: +8% for Goblin units
Physical resistance: 5% for Goblin and Night Goblin Infantry units

technology.short_description: "Love 'em equally, or else…"

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: +10 with all factions
Hero recruitment cost: -20%

technology.short_description: "You can keep my share of da loot, Boss! Jus' don't 'urt me!"

effects.description: Income from all buildings: +5%

technology.short_description: "Of course dey's not as good as you boss, but dey's still pretty good."

effects.description: [HIDDEN - do not translate] Used to increase lord rank when replacing a lord (target the effect at forces factionwide) - use in conjunction with a shown effect that targets provinces factionwide
Lord recruit rank: +4

technology.short_description: "Let’s see how dem useless gobbos work when we withhold some of their rations."

effects.description: Construction cost: -5% for all buildings

technology.short_description: "Gettin' a bit crowded 'round 'ere lately. Put da gits to good use!"

effects.description: Global recruitment duration: -1 turn for all units
Global recruitment capacity: +2

technology.short_description: "Da more scrap we can carry, da more stuff we’s gonna make for da killin’!"

effects.description: Scrap: +10 per turn

technology.short_description: "Each of these 'ere boys iz one of da ladz now, Boss. Makin' us proud!"

effects.description: Recruit rank: +1

technology.short_description: "Have ya eva seen such a pretty site? There aint nuthin' greena or meana than a full-blown Waaagh!"

effects.description: Reputation: +5 per turn

technology.short_description: "Someone tell those gits to move those legs fasta or we'll send da Squigs after 'em!"

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +10%

technology.short_description: "If we tell da ladz to kill each other less, dey can kill da enemy more!"

effects.description: Attrition: -25% casualties suffered from all attrition
Income from post-battle loot: +10%

technology.short_description: "Sometimes I fink dem Shamans are just wingin' it, but if dey's helpin' I ain't complainin'!"

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +8%

Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +15
	(all armies)

technology.short_description: "If we send some of da big 'uns, I'm sure dey can 'convince' some of da other tribes' ladz to join us…"

effects.description: Recruitment cost: -5%

technology.short_description: "So many shiny fings! We need a bigga cart so we make sure we gets it all!"

effects.description: Income from raiding: +25%

technology.short_description: "Look at all da strong boyz dat 'ave come to da Waaagh!"

technology.short_description: "Da ladz keep chargin' ahead ta get dere first!"

technology.short_description: "Da bigga da wagonz, da 'arder dey will be smashin'."

Missile strength: +5% for Goblin and Night Goblin Missile Infantry units

technology.short_description: When they have time, Orcs file Boars' tusks or strap pointy things to them to better impale "da softies".

technology.short_description: "Ya can't teach a fish to climb a tree, but ya can teach a Troll to hit fings harder!"

technology.short_description: "I know a guy… he's pretty 'orrible."

technology.short_description: "The betta the metal, the betta the murderin'!"

technology.short_description: "Everyone knows dat a bit of red paint on anyfink makes everyfink go fasta!"

Casualty replenishment rate: +5% for Savage Orc units

technology.short_description: Giants pull down the biggest trees to use as clubs, clobbering anything in their path.
Each rock that smashes the ground whether from the arm of a rogue idol or the sling of a rock lobber sends out a devastating shockwave that shakes the earth itself.

effects.description: Scrap Upgrades Unlocked for: Giant and Rogue Idol
Weapon strength: +5% for Giant units
Physical resistance: 10% for Rogue Idol units

technology.short_description: "Oi! Imagine if we made dem beasties even nastier!"
Goblins are born scavengers, able to find dubious treasure in the most useless of places.
As long as it flies at least somewhat straight, nobody cares what it is made of.
"Da battle's over, ladz! Now go 'n' pick up anyfink dat's 'andy!"
"Look at all dat smashin' an' skewerin' stuff! Dem squishies sure make big throwas!"
Greenskin ingenuity is as mind-boggling as it is effective.
"We hit da jackpot, boyz!"
A concert development involving rocks, lots of rolling, and hard metals.
